name: Furry Fandom
startIntroPart2: You could have chosen a normal nation. Why must you choose the path of perpetual torment?
attacked: As a wise man once said, if a fuwwy can affowd a 1000% dowwaw fuwsuit, they can affowd a 10$ pipe bomb in youw maiwbox.
defeated: Congratulations! You did the right thing and destroyed the worst nation in this mod!
introduction: Hewwo, I am Fwoofwes, lowd of cwinge uwu.
afterPeace: You get the sinking feeling you made the wrong choice.
uniques: Gain a free [Unique Shrine] [in all cities], [+1 Science] per every [2] [Faith]
uniqueText: Furries are the masters of cringe. Every city starts with a shrine, making this garbage civ overpowered for religion. If that isn't already enough, they get a stupidly powerful wonder in the Industrial era that almost ensures religion spreads like wildfire. Horrifically unbalanced, but what did you expect from a joke mod?

name: Weeb Army
startIntroPart1: They always made fun of you
startIntroPart2: While they were building wonders and settling cities, you were studying the blade. Now they will regret their insulting of your waifu! Your people emerge from their basements, rainbow katanas in hand... The world shall be ours! We will rule the world alongside our body pillow waifus!
attacked: You dare trifle with a master of the blade? Your arrogance will be your fall!
defeated: Your conquest of the weebs strikes fear in the hearts of their people. They retreat to the unholy depths of 4chan with their body pillows in defeat.
introduction: While you were out there building wonders and settling cities, I was studying the blade. And now that the world is starting and the barbarians at the gate, you have the audacity to come to me for help?
neutralLetsHearIt: Heh, you got my attention kid.
neutralNo: You'll have to try better than that, bucko.
neutralYes: A good deal, for a uncultured swine.
hateHello: You should see me when I go all out, because you won't see it for long.
hateLetsHearIt: Fine, show me your paltry deal.
hateNo: Typical of you to make such a garbage deal.
afterPeace: I suppose I am feeling merciful today, swine.
tradeRequest: You won't get a deal better than this, idiot.
uniques: Earn [50]% of the damage done to [Military] units as [Culture]
uniqueText: As students of the Blade, your military units learn more from combat, and when they brag about it, half the damage they do is converted to culture. Very strong civ for a Culture/Domination victory. Also, they don't use guns, as a katana is always better than practical weapons.
